patthana17.24:4.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:5.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:5.4: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.24:6.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana17.24:6.4: Hetuyā adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.24:7.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
